scripts.docker:build:latest: docker build --build-arg REVISION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --build-arg VERSION=latest -t beabee/deno-node:latest -f ./Dockerfile ../..
scripts.docker:build:local: docker build --build-arg REVISION=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --build-arg VERSION=local -t beabee/deno-node:local -f ./Dockerfile ../..
